core:description.text: A handsome clay jug with decorative bee motifs pressed into its surface, sealed with a cork and stamped with beeswax. The golden-amber liquid within is thick and viscous, promising sweetness. A rich honey fragrance clings to the vessel.

items:liquid_container.flavorText: The mead is luxuriously sweet with deep honey notes and subtle floral undertones. It coats the throat like liquid gold and spreads warmth through your limbs with every swallow.
